ComicInfo.Title: Santa and New Year's; Ecclesiasticus 9, 1-9; Saint Agnes; Fits of Passion; The Pig People of Paraguay; The Gospel According to Father Phlem; Divine Anarchy; The Curse of Saint Dymphna; Marozia's Secret
